mapper.select: SELECT w.warehouseCode, w.warehouseName, w.capacityLimit, w.address, w.memberCode, m.name AS memberName, m.email AS memberEmail FROM Warehouse w LEFT JOIN MemberAccount m ON w.memberCode = m.memberCode
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Warehouse (warehouseCode, warehouseName, capacityLimit, address, memberCode) VALUES (#{warehouseCode}, #{warehouseName}, #{capacityLimit}, #{address}, #{memberCode})
INSERT INTO Section (sectionCode, warehouseCode, storageCapacity, storedType, temperature) VALUES (#{sectionCode}, #{warehouseCode}, #{storageCapacity}, #{storedType}, #{temperature})
mapper.select: SELECT m.memberCode, m.authorityCode, m.name FROM MemberAccount m WHERE m.memberCode NOT IN ( SELECT w.memberCode FROM Warehouse w WHERE w.memberCode IS NOT NULL ) AND m.authorityCode LIKE '%WM%'
SELECT warehouseCode FROM Warehouse WHERE warehouseCode LIKE CONCAT(#{prefix}, '%')

SELECT CASE -- 입고 상태가 진행 중인 경우 (입고요청, 승인대기) WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM Inbound WHERE warehouseCode = #{warehouseCode} AND inboundStatus IN ('입고진행', '승인대기') ) THEN '입고진행'
-- 출고 상태가 준비 중인 경우 (출고준비 또는 출고대기) WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM OrderDetail od JOIN Outbound ob ON od.orderDetailCode = ob.orderDetailCode WHERE od.orderStatus = '배송준비' AND ob.outboundStatus IN ('출고준비', '출고대기') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM Inventory i WHERE i.warehouseCode = #{warehouseCode} AND i.inventoryCode = ob.inventoryCode ) ) THEN '출고진행'
-- 재고가 있는 경우 WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM Inventory WHERE warehouseCode = #{warehouseCode} AND quantity > 0 ) THEN '재고있음'
-- 진행 중인 입고/출고 작업이 없고 재고도 없는 경우 ELSE '삭제가능' END AS status
